short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily capture captions from your Google Meet meetings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Show Google Meet meeting transcript in a list. 
2. Can copy transcript to translate to support for in a meeting. Double-click to copy a transcript. Control/Command + click to copy the focused text and open it in Google Translate.
